text: apane aapako un logon ke saath thaam rakho, jo praatahkaal aur saayankaal apane rab ko usakee prasannata chaahate hue pukaarate hai aur saansaarik jeevan kee shobha kee chaah mein tumhaaree aankhen unase na phiren. aur aise vyakti kee baat na maanana jisake dil ko hamane apanee yaad se gaafil paaya hai aur vah apanee ichchha aur vaasana ke peechhe laga hua hai aur usaka maamala had se aage badh gaya hai
